A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Will definitely be seeing again in the theaters.  A fun\, rollicking ride.  Middle movies in trilogies are difficult\, but this is interesting\, has good arcs\, growing characters\, and surprising moments.  (I also would rate eps 1\,2\,3\,7 at 5 stars\, not so much 4\,5\,6.)
